names = input()

names = names.split('-')
for i in range(len(names)):
    names[i] = names[i][0]

print(''.join(names))

full = input()
print(full[0] + "".join([i[0] for i in full.split("-")[1:]]))

def main():
    n = input()
    n = n.split('-')
    for i in n:
        print(i[0], end="")
    print()

main()
